description: This file serves as the entry point for a React-based frontend application. It imports React and ReactDOM libraries, CSS styling, and the main App component. It mounts the App component onto a DOM element with id 'root' and renders it within React's StrictMode for highlighting potential problems.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering React components into the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the created root.
